info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 10:56AM CST until January 05 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...A wintry mix of wet snow and sleet expected. Total new snow accumulations of a dusting up to one inch with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Much of western, northern, central, and portions of eastern Arkansas. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CST this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions. For more information from the National Weather Service visit http://weather.gov/lzk
